TrainingDetails.Name: Page Types and Schemas

IfComponent.label: Check if this is a component tutorial

TrainingDetails.Title: Page Types and Schemas
TrainingDetails.Abstract: This is a list of page types and their corresponding schemas
TrainingDetails.BodyCopy:
This is a summary list of all the page types that are on Ingeniux. This list should help you find the correct schema type. This list is based on the page type example name. The examples are list in folder Page Type Examples in the folders of the Ingeniux CMS System. This page will be updated on a continual baises as new pages are created and old ones are removed.

 

Please note that some templates are not generally available, as they have unique purposes restricted to academic, administrative, or site-wide functions.

 

How to create a new page.

1.To create a new page go to the location where you want to create your page.

2.Go to the top of the Ingeniux Window and click new then page

3.In the window type in the name of your new page

4. Select the corresponding scheme at the bottom of the window

5. Click create

 

Summary List

Page TypeSchemaDescription
A-Z Index Info Page type A-Z Info Page Index page for the whole site. Only used by the root of the website.
Advising | Career and Academic Front Career Academic page Home page of Career and Academic Department
Advising | Grad Planner (!Broken) Glad Planner
Advising | Group Index Group Index
Advising | Major Information Major Info Page A page for displaying information for the majors offered at BYu-Idaho
Department | Front Department Page Front page to all of the Departments
General | Audience Front General Audience Page A landing page for the general public
General | Blank Page | With Header Blank Page with Header *Only for use by University Communications and Creative Services
General | Blank Page | With Left Nav Blank Page with Left Nav A black page with a left navigation for custom content
General | Contact | Faculty Faculty Page Display Faculty Information
General | Custom | Full Width Custom Page with Header
General | Image Gallery | 1.0 Photo Gallery Photo gallery 1.0. Similar to IGX-Style Gallery
General | Image Gallery | 2.0 Image Gallery Image gallery for general use. User-changeable settings. it comes in two types full width images, and one with left navigation.
General | Index | A-Z Definition A-Z Info Page Index page for the whole site. Only used by the root of the website
General | Index | A-Z Site Top Introduction A-Z Index List sites and pages alphabetically. Has a description area at the top.
General | Index | A-Z Site A-Z Index List sites and pages alphabetically
General | Index | Section Section Index Creates a mini
General | Photo Gallery IGX-Style | Left Nav Photo Gallery Photo gallery proto type based off of the Ingeniux original
General | Print Page (!Broken)
General | Section Front General Landing Page Section main page
General | Section Front | Blue Links General Landing Page Section main page with blue links
General | Text and Image Common Text Page General Content page with optional image
Home | Front Home The Main Home Page

News Room Page Types

Page TypeSchemaDescription
General | Detail | News News detail Detail page for news section
General | Archive | News News Archive Archive page for news section
General | Front | News News Front Front page for news section
